summary.span: 表示用于从安全令牌服务获取已颁发令牌的信息。

span.span: Represents information used to obtain an issued token from a security token service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端与安全令牌服务进行 WS 信任交换以获取已颁发的令牌时，它有时必须与安全令牌服务交换密钥平均信息量以获得一个共享的对称密钥。When the client does WS-Trust exchange with the Security Token Service to obtain the issued token, it sometimes must exchange key entropy with the Security Token Service to arrive at a shared symmetric key. 安全令牌服务通常指定要在其绑定中使用的平均信息量交换机制。The Security Token Service typically specifies the entropy exchange mechanism to use in its binding. 如果未在安全令牌服务的绑定中指定这样的机制，则使用 `DefaultKeyEntropyMode` 值与安全令牌服务交换平均信息量。If no such mechanism is specified in the Security Token Service's binding, the `DefaultKeyEntropyMode` value is used to exchange entropy with the Security Token Service. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#17)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#17)]

span.span: An attempt was made to a read-only credential.

summary.span: 获取或设置已颁发令牌的续订阈值百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the renewal threshold percentage for issued tokens.

value.span: 已颁发令牌的续订阈值百分比。

span.span: The renewal threshold percentage for issued tokens.
The default value is 60.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端会缓存已颁发的令牌，并且当缓存的已颁发令牌在不久的将来将过期时，客户端会从安全令牌服务自动获取一个新颁发的令牌。The client caches issued tokens and when a cached issued token is going to expire in the near future, the client automatically gets a fresh issued token from the Security Token Service. 此属性的值确定在获取新颁发的令牌之前，缓存的已颁发令牌的有效期必须过去多少百分比。The value of this property determines what percentage of the cached issued token's validity period must be over before getting a fresh issued token. 例如，如果该属性的值为 60，且客户端获取了一个有效期为 100 分钟的已颁发令牌，则它会重用该缓存的已颁发令牌 60 分钟，在此之后它会从安全令牌服务获取一个新颁发的令牌。For example, if this property's value is 60, and the client gets an issued token that is valid for 100 minutes, it reuses the cached issued token for 60 minutes, after which it gets a fresh issued token from the Security Token Service. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#16)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#16)]

span.span: An attempt was made to a read-only credential.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuerChannelBehaviors As Dictionary(Of Uri, KeyedByTypeCollection(Of IEndpointBehavior))

summary.span: 获取颁发者通道行为的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of issuer channel behaviors.
A of s.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典密钥是客户端希望进行通信的安全令牌服务的 URI。The dictionary keys are the URIs of the Security Token Services that the client wants to communicate with. 每个 URI 的条目都是 终结点行为的一个，应用程序会在由 WCF 创建的通道中使用该终结点行为，以从安全令牌服务获取已颁发的令牌。The entry for each URI is a of the endpoint behaviors that the application uses in the channels created by WCF to get the issued tokens from the Security Token Services.

summary.span: 获取或设置本地颁发者的地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the address of the local issuer.
The of the local issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从安全令牌服务获取已颁发的令牌时，必须使用安全令牌服务的地址配置客户端应用程序。When obtaining an issued token from a Security Token Service, the client application must be configured with the address of the Security Token Service. 此信息可由目标服务在其安全策略中指定。This information can be specified by the target service in its security policy. 如果目标服务未在其安全策略中指定此信息，则客户端的 WCF 通道将使用 `LocalIssuerAddress` 作为安全令牌服务的地址，从中获取已颁发的令牌。In case the target service does not specify this information in its security policy, the client's WCF channel uses the `LocalIssuerAddress` as the address of the Security Token Service from which to obtain the issued token. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#31)]

span.span: An attempt was made to a read-only credential.

summary.span: 获取或设置本地颁发者的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding of the local issuer.
The of the local issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从安全令牌服务获取已颁发的令牌时，必须使用该绑定配置客户端应用程序，以用于与安全令牌服务进行通信。When obtaining an issued token from a Security Token Service, the client application must be configured with the binding to use to communicate with the Security Token Service. 如果目标服务未在其安全策略中指定安全令牌服务的相关信息，则客户端的 WCF 通道将使用 LocalIssuerBinding 作为绑定，以用于与安全令牌服务进行通信。In case the target service does not specify information about the Security Token Service in its security policy, the client's WCF channel uses the LocalIssuerBinding as the binding to use to communicate with the Security Token Service. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#13)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#13)]

summary.span: 获取或设置已颁发令牌的最大缓存时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum caching time for an issued token.

value.span: 一个 ，表示已颁发令牌的最大缓存时间。

span.span: A that represents the maximum caching time for an issued token.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，WCF 客户端通道会缓存从安全令牌服务获取的已颁发令牌。By default, issued tokens obtained from the Security Token Service are cached by the WCF client channel. 该属性允许应用程序指定通道缓存已颁发令牌的最大时间。This property enables the application to specify the maximum time that the channel caches the issued token. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#15)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#15)]
